alarms.details: The Ralf process has been restored to normal operation.

Monit has detected that the Ralf process has failed. A restart will automatically be attempted. If this alarm does not clear, the Ralf process may have been stopped or an unrecoverable failure may have occurred.
Ralf communication to at least one Memcached has been restored.

Ralf is unable to contact any Memcacheds. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one Memcached is operationsl and that network connectivity exists between it and Ralf.
Ralf communication to at least one Chronos has been restored.

Ralf is unable to contact any Chronos's. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one Chronos is operationsl and that network connectivity exists between it and Ralf.
Ralf communication to at least one CDF has been restored.

Ralf is unable to contact any CDFs. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one HSS is operationsl and that network connectivity exists between it and Ralf.
Ralf communication to Memcached for a vBucket has been restored.

Ralf is unable to contact any Memcacheds for a vBucket. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that all Memcacheds are operationsl and that network connectivity exists between them and Ralf.
